utenlandsopphold.siste12Måneder.spørsmål: Where have you lived in the last 12 months?
utenlandsopphold.siste12MånederInfotekst: Read more about previous stays abroad
You answer lived abroad in whole or in part only if you have resided in a country other than Norway. Short trips abroad in connection with, for example, holidays are not included.
lived abroad in whole or in part
utenlandsopphold.neste12Måneder.spørsmål: Where are you going to live for the next 12 months?
utenlandsopphold.neste12MånederInfotekst: Read more about future stays abroad
You answer to live abroad in whole or in part only if you plan to stay permanently in a country other than Norway. Short trips abroad in connection with, for example, holidays are not included.
stay abroad in whole or in part
You must select the countries you are staying in.
You must choose a country to stay in.
valideringsfeil.fraOgMedDato.gyldigDato: From and including date must be a valid date in the format dd.mm.yyyy
valideringsfeil.tilOgMedDato.gyldigDato: Up to and including date must be a valid date in the format dd.mm.yyyy
valideringsfeil.utenlandsopphold.ikkeReg: You have not entered a stay abroad for the last 12 months
valideringsfeil.utenlandsopphold.siste12: You have not entered a stay abroad for the last 12 months
valideringsfeil.utenlandsopphold.neste12: You have not entered a stay abroad for the next 12 months
valideringsfeil.utenlandsopphold.overlap: You have already booked a stay abroad during this period
utenlandsopphold.leggTilUtenlandsopphold: What country did you live in?
Which country should you live in?
utenlandsopphold.infoOmFødselsattest: Du har opplyst at du skal være i {land} når du har termin {termindato}. Hvis du føder i utlandet må du ettersende fødselsattest til oss slik at vi får registrert fødselsdatoen til barnet. Grunnen til at du må sende inn fødselsattest er at vi ikke får inn opplysninger om fødselen automatisk når du ikke føder i Norge.
søknad.footer.spørsmålMåBesvares: To move forward, you must answer all of the above questions.
søknadSendt.info.innhold: We have received your application and you do not need to do anything more. We will contact you if we have questions or if we need more information from you.
søknadSendt.pengene.tittel: Where will the money be paid?
søknadSendt.pengene.ingenKontonummer: You do not have a registered bank account
søknadSendt.pengene.infoBox: Hvis søknaden din blir innvilget, blir foreldrepengene dine enten utbetalt av arbeidsgiveren din eller av NAV. Sjekk at du har registrert riktig kontonummer hos oss.
velkommen.erMann.boblelenketekst: The application for the father can be found here.
velkommen.erMann.bobletekst: You cannot submit an application for the mother. If you are the person who will receive the lump-sum grant, you have to fill out the application in paper form and send this by mail.
velkommen.generellFeil.ingress: Unfortunately, something went wrong. Please try again later. If the errors continue to occur {lenke}.
velkommen.innsendingFeilet.ingress: Unfortunately, something went wrong during submission of your application. Please try again later. If the errors continue to occur {lenke}.
velkommen.standard.bobletekst: Remember that if your child is not yet born, you must attach confirmation of the expected date of delivery.
velkommen.standard.ingress: The lump-sum grant is a tax-free lump sum that you can receive for each child you give birth to or adopt.
velkommen.standard.velkommentittel: Welcome to the application for a lump-sum grant
velkommen.text.hjelpedeg: I will assist you with filling out the application .
velkommen.text.nySøknadAdvarsel: Your existing application will be deleted.
velkommen.text.personopplysningene.link: Read about how NAV processes your personal data
velkommen.text.samtykke: I confirm that I have read and understood
velkommen.text.samtykkeIntro: To proceed with the application, you must confirm that you have read and understood your duties.
velkommen.text.startNySøknadPrompt: Are you sure you want to start a new application? The application you started will be deleted.
velkommen.text.veiviser.lenke: Use the wizard to find out what you are entitled to
velkommen.text.veiviser: If you have had income, received payments from NAV or been in the national service, you may be entitled to the parental benefit instead of the lump-sum grant. However, if you choose to apply for the lump-sum grant, you cannot change your mind at a later date.
velkommen.under18.boblelenketekst: A paper application can be downloaded here.
velkommen.under18.bobletekst: Because you are under the age of 18, one of your parents or a guardian must sign the application together with you. You therefore have to fill out the application in paper form and send this by mail.
omBarnet.vedlegg.feilmelding.forstorefil: {antall, plural, one {Vedlegget} other {Vedleggene}} is for {antall, plural, one {stort} other {store}}. Maximum total amount is {maks}.
omBarnet.vedlegg.feilmelding.vedleggMang: Confirmation of the expected date of delivery has not been uploaded
oppsummering.text.boddSisteTolv: During the last 12 months I have lived in
oppsummering.text.lesNoye: Please review the summary before submitting your application. If you need to make changes you can go back.
oppsummering.text.medTermindato: with expected date of delivery on
oppsummering.text.ogKommerPåFødselstidsp: and at the time of the birth will
oppsummering.text.samtykke: The information I have provided is correct and I have not withheld information that is of importance to my entitlement to the lump-sum grant.
oppsummering.text.varPåFødselstidspunkte: and at the time of the birth was
oppsummering.text.vedlagtTerminbekreftel: Confirmation of the expected date of delivery is attached
personopplysninger.ingress.1: NAV collects and receives data pertaining to you when you submit an application. This is necessary for you to be able to receive the correct service and benefits.
personopplysninger.ingress.2: You have chosen to apply for the lump-sum grant. This is a National Insurance benefit that you may be entitled to if you satisfy the requirements. The requirements are listed at nav.no/engangsstønad.
personopplysninger.opplysningerViInnhent: your connection to Norway, your work situation and your income
social security schemes you may be entitled to in other countries
We can also send information about you to social security schemes in other countries.
personopplysninger.sectionheading: NAV processes your personal data in the following manner
personopplysninger.text.automatiskLagrin: the information you provide in the application
information about your work situation from the Register of Employees and Employers
information about your income from the A-melding report
If you apply after the child has been born, we will process your application automatically if we have sufficient information. The automatic processing is based on
personopplysninger.text.lagringAvOpplysn: If you submit the application, information you have provided in the application will be stored in accordance with the Norwegian Public Archives Act.
If you cancel the application, the information you have registered in the application will be deleted.
personopplysninger.text.opplysningerViIn: To process your application, we collect information relating to
Data we collect from you and public registries
personopplysninger.text.personvernerkler: You can read more about how NAV processes personal data in the Norwegian Labour and Welfare Administration’s Privacy Statement at {link}
personopplysninger.text.svarPåSøknaden.2: how you can access the case processing documents and the rules that were applied
personopplysninger.text.svarPåSøknaden.3: how to appeal if you disagree with the decision
personopplysninger.text.svarPåSøknaden.i: Once the application has been processed, you will receive a decision letter.  This will inform you of the
rettigheter.text.2: I understand that if I provide incorrect information or withhold information, this may have consequences for my entitlement to the lump-sum grant.
rettigheter.text.lestOgForstått: I have read and understood what is stated at {link}
terminbekreftelsen.sectionheading: Confirmation of the expected date of delivery
terminbekreftelsen.text.terminbekreftels: You must attach confirmation of the expected date of delivery with your application. This must be dated and signed by a doctor or midwife during your 22nd week of pregnancy or later.
valideringsfeil.bekreftOpplysninger: You must confirm that the information is correct
valideringsfeil.fodselsdato.duMåOppgi: You must state the date of birth
valideringsfeil.fodselsdato.ikkeMerEnn3Å: You cannot apply for the lump-sum grant benefit for children who are more than three years of age.
valideringsfeil.fodselsdato.måVæreIdagEl: The birth date must be today’s date or earlier
valideringsfeil.velkommen.bekreftLestOgF: You must confirm that you have read and understood
valideringsfeil.terminbekreftelseDato.du: You must state when confirmation of the expected date of delivery is dated
The confirmation of the expected date of delivery must show that you are in the 22nd week of pregnancy or later
valideringsfeil.terminbekreftelseDato.må: The date of the confirmation of the expected date of delivery cannot be in the future.
valideringsfeil.termindato.duMåOppgi: You must provide the expected date of delivery
valideringsfeil.termindato.duMåVæreIUke2: The earliest at which you can submit an application is when you are in the 22nd week of pregnancy
valideringsfeil.termindato.termindatoKan: The expected date of delivery cannot be earlier than 3 weeks from the present date
valideringsfeil.utenlandsopphold.dagensE: The date has to be today or a later date
valideringsfeil.utenlandsopphold.etterFr: The date has to be after the from date
valideringsfeil.utenlandsopphold.førTilD: The date has to before the to date
valideringsfeil.utenlandsoppholdUtenforP: You cannot add a stay in the chosen period of time

vedlegg.tomFil: You can not upload an empty file

sesjonUtløpt.avslutt: No, I would like to exit
sesjonUtløpt.fortsett: Yes, I would like to continue
sesjonUtløpt.ingress: You have to log in again to continue the application. Would you like to proceed?
søknadContainer.prompt: If you leave the page no information will be saved. Do you wish to continue?
psg.åpneLabel: Read more about how to take a good picture of an attachment
psg.innholdstittel: Take a picture of the attachment and upload
psg.section1.tittel: This is how you take a good picture:
psg.section1.liste.punkt1: Keep your mobile or camera directly above the picture.
psg.section1.liste.punkt2: The attachment should fill the whole picture. The picture should not contain any other documentation or objects.
psg.section1.liste.punkt3: The picture must capture all text in the attachment. If the attachment is written across multiple pages, you should take multiple pictures.
psg.section2.tittel: After you have taken the picture, check the following before uploading:
psg.section2.liste.punkt1: The picture has a proper alignment.
psg.section2.liste.punkt2: The text of the attachment is readable.
psg.section2.liste.punkt3: The picture has good lighting without shadows.
psg.icon.heading: Good and bad examples of pictures
psg.icon.label.good: The attachment fills the whole picture
psg.lenkepanel.text: More help on how to upload an attachment (is opened in a new window).
søknadSendt.status.tittel: See the status of your case
